title: Hazukashigariya No Tsuma To Shinkon Seikatsu Hajimemashita
alternative_title: 恥ずかしがり屋の妻と新婚生活はじめました ; 容易害羞的妻子与新婚生活的开始 ; Starting My Married Life with My Shy Wife ; Hazukashigariya no Tsuma to Shinkon Seikatsu Hajimemashita
status: 恥ずかしがり屋の妻と新婚生活はじめました ; 容易害羞的妻子与新婚生活的开始 ; Starting My Married Life with My Shy Wife ; Hazukashigariya no Tsuma to Shinkon Seikatsu Hajimemashita
description:
Description :
        Eat lunch at the convenience store, go home, take a bath, sleep. This was how I lived my life, but that ends today! My cute wife is now... wait why's she so distant?!A comedic glimpse in the exciting newlywed life with a very shy but cute wife.
